sentence.Network_en: The little witch put a mock malignity into her beautiful eyes, and Joseph, trembling with sincere horror, hurried out praying and ejaculating " wicked " as he went.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个小女巫那双美丽的眼睛里添上一种嘲弄的恶毒神气. 约瑟夫真的吓得直抖, 赶紧跑出去,一边跑一边祷告,还嚷着 “ 恶毒! ”

sentence.Network_en: Outside, the pitiless rain fell , fell steadily, with a fierce malignity that was all too human.
sentence.Network_cn: 外面下着无情的雨, 不断地下着, 简直跟通人性那样凶狠而恶毒.

sentence.Network_en: The real Chinaman may be cunning, but there is no malignity in his cunning.
sentence.Network_cn: 真正的中国人也许狡猾, 但狡猾中并无阴险.
